result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Angel A Mercado Arias in court.  Attorney Claire Longdin in court for Angel A Mercado Arias.  Attorney Grace M. Gall in court for State of Wisconsin. Deputy court clerk cmt.

Defendant Angel A Mercado Arias in court with attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Grace M. Gall appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
CASE HELD OFF THE RECORD PER JUDGE. Case in Court for a status conference.  Defense requests a plea and sentencing date.  Court set the matter as requested.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 8, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Supervision Report - 06-09-2022

Defendant Angel A Mercado Arias in court with attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Grace M. Gall appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: STW
Case set for status conference. Defendent has pending case set for prelim. Case adjourned, Branch 40.  Status conference scheduled for June 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Angel A Mercado Arias in court with Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Grace M. Gall appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
CASE HELD OFF THE RECORD PER JUDGE.  Case in court for scheduling conference.  Defense requests a status date.  Court set date as requested.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.  Status conference scheduled for May 12, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Supervision Report - 04-11-2022

Defendant Angel A Mercado Arias in court with Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Matthew Zisi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 40, Judge Shelton. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 40.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision Report - 02-28-2022

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  
No driving without a valid license.

Defendant Angel A Mercado Arias in court with attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Defendant Angel A Mercado Arias in custody.  Ian F Vance-Curzan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Angel A Mercado Arias appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Shelton, Branch 40. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has NOT been obtained from the Defendant.  Court ordered the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department to obtain DNA sample from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant hemay qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
